content.raw: Regarding the ShaderHelper code in Heightmap.cc. I think the ogre terrain GLSL shader generation code wasn't quite working at the time so we had to subclass it and make some fixes. Over time, we made more changes for it to work on OSX. That was a while ago so hopefully it's better now with ogre-1.11.
